name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Agent Assist powered by Wizr AI

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI-powered extension automates ticket tagging, retrieves relevant past tickets and generates responses using your knowledgebase

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Wizr AI Agent Assist - Enhance Your Support Team's Productivity Supercharge your support team with our Wizr AI Agent Assist, the ultimate AI-powered extension for customer service. Designed to streamline workflows, operations and boost productivity, this innovative tool automates essential support tasks, enabling your agents to deliver top-notch customer service effortlessly.
Key Features:
● Smart Ticket Tagging: Automatically categorize the ticket into specific buckets and prioritize tickets based on their content, ensuring faster and more efficient issue resolution.
● Past Ticket Lookup: Quickly find and reference similar past tickets to help agents understand and resolve recurring issues more effectively.
● FAQ Integration: Seamlessly access a comprehensive FAQ database to provide accurate and consistent answers to common customer questions.
● Response Generation: Use advanced AI to draft accurate, personalized responses to user queries using vast knowledge base, SOP and other documentation, saving time and maintaining high-quality interactions.
Benefits:
● Boost Efficiency: Automate routine tasks to allow your agents to focus on more complex issues.
● Improve Accuracy: Ensure consistent and accurate responses with AI-driven solutions.
● Enhance Customer Satisfaction: Provide timely and relevant support, improving overall customer experience.
